ygData.subject: Nutch

Another related open-source project, Nutch, which includes a crawler
as part of its functionality:

    http://www.nutch.org

   "Nutch is a nascent effort to implement an open-source web search engine."

Doug Cutting, the originator of the highly-capable Lucene pure Java full
text search library, also has a hand in Nutch.

Their sections on "Policies" and "Webmasters" include good practices for
an open-source crawler, including marking the CVS version of the code with
a different user-agent than the version run officially. 

We should aspire to match their coding practices, too, though we may
not want to enforce the strict requirements for commits until we're
a little further along.

Look over their web pages; I'm taking a closer look at their code for 
reusable parts.

- Gordon
